actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-227.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #181 (262-131).

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Congressional Operations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-227) Directs the payment of expenses, not to exceed $440,000 out of the contingent fund of the House for investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Congressional Operations.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations and studies to be conducted by the Select Committee on Congressional Operations.
